prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Metatron's Cube emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with primordial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TAPAMAL's profile: 'She who is like she was at the beginning', Aethyr LOE, Fire element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'When TAPAMAL stands before you, the first note of a cosmic hymn resounds re-striking the fundamental...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

profile_data.title: 'She who is like she was at the beginning'
profile_data.essence: When TAPAMAL stands before you, the first note of a cosmic hymn resounds re-striking the fundamental tone from which worlds are born.
profile_data.angelic_role: Principality of Cosmic Genesis; leads tempestuous messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic, multi-dimensional entity emerging from fractal geometries of pure fire, representing the moment of cosmic genesis where potential crystallizes into momentary form
profile_data.color_reasoning: Obsidian-crimson represents Geburah's transformative power, while electric azure signifies the liminal space between destruction and creation in the LOE Aethyr
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine emergence and quantum potential
